title: A11ygato
creator: Orange
description:
A11gato is a web interface that allows you to monitor the accessibility of your websites. 
The suite is composed of a webapp, a CLI and a Node.js API. The dashboard lets you execute audits from a URL, a tree of URLs or a puppeteer script. You can also schedule audits and monitor your KPI evolution.
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
